install.name: SSO - IP
install.author: Sam Moffatt
install.description: Automatically logs users as administrator if they are on the IP list.

param.name: ip_list
param.label: IP List
param.description: IP addresses to use for Single Sign On (newline seperated)

param.name: use_table
param.label: Use Table
param.description: Uses the #__jauthtools_ipmap table to map IP addresses or ranges to usernames
